title: free champion rotation
body: guys i made a new account and now im level 5.my problem is that when i go to champ select it keeps giving me the same champs to pick, different from the free champions rotation .whats wrong?

replies.body: New account have their own [new player rotation ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion#h5)until level 6, and offers special champions suited for them.  Once you reach 6, you'll start seeing the normal rotation.  Let me know if that clears things up!
